channel.title: Need help with No-ip?
channel.description: Hey guys i have a 317 source and client that trisidia 317 released and im trying to put my no-ip in there but it saids error connecting to server but i no i did it it right i went in client and source and replaced with his no-ip to mine and the 127.0.0.1 but still no luck i used utorrent for portforwarding still no luck if some one helps me get the server online i give you admin in game thx

item.title: Need help with No-ip?
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

if utorrent is still running that might be your problem

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with No-ip?
item.dc:creator: @xElite xElite
item.description:
@xElite wrote:

Go to your client.java in your client files and search up server = and beside that in the quotes type 127.0.0.1 to connect. If you want people to connect put your server ip thereand port forward it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with No-ip?
item.dc:creator: @Mattjredd95 Mattjredd95
item.description:
@Mattjredd95 wrote:

lol im srry but im still kinda confuse can someone help me through skype or something
add me Mattjredd95

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with No-ip?
item.dc:creator: @fier12 fier12
item.description:
@fier12 wrote:

Lol just to sum it all up… Go into your client folder and open client.java search for “server =” and in-between the “” after you search their should be a 127.0.0.1 or no-ip.

If their is a no-ip you can not connect to server, you can only connect to 127.0.0.1 … And you not supposed to change anything else besides client.java in the client folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with No-ip?
item.dc:creator: @V_1_N_C_H V 1 N C H
item.description:
@V_1_N_C_H wrote:

You can use no-ip but you cant connect to it locally…what I’m trying to say is that YOU can only connect to 127.0.0.1 and others can only connect to the no-ip address.

Read full topic
